Description:
Picture Perfect Family Abode
Positioned in one of the most tranquil pockets of Derrimut this 4 bedroom north facing residence is the perfect family home. Upon entry be amazed with the impressive floor plan of this magnificent property. Offering 4 generous sized bedrooms with BIR's & master with WIR and ensuite. Walk down the hall and enjoy the large formal lounge before open up to your large entertainers open plan kitchen meals and living area fully equipped with stone bench tops & SS Appliances. Further features include ducted heating, cooling, high ceilings, down lights throughout, and much more. Not only is it a magnificent modern day property but just have a look at the location. Within close proximity to schools, public transport, parkland's ,Derrimut village shopping centre & easy access to freeways.
Auction Time 11th of July 1:00pm
Edward Herdegen 0401 946 597

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Custom built to standards never before seen in Derrimut, this unique and funky abode sets a new benchmark in quality and luxury for the area. Like nothing you have ever seen before, prepare to be mesmerised by the gleaming hardwood floors and soaring high ceilings upon entry. The magnificent kitchen features thick stone benches, glass and window splashback, 900mm appliances and built in coffee machine and overlooks the dining and living area highlighted by the feature fireplace. Sleeping quarters comprise master bedroom with enormous walk in robe and state of the art ensuite with twin vanities and double shower, and 2 additional bedrooms are serviced by a main bathroom of the highest order featuring floor to ceiling glass splashback and spa. A separate study, lovely low maintenance alfresco and rear yard and double remote garage with internal access complete the home. Custom high doors, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, square set plastering, bulkheads, down lights, plantation shutters, thick stone benches in kitchen, both bathrooms, powder room and study, upgraded fixtures and fittings and ducted vacuum are just a few of the endless extras that the new purchaser will be able to enjoy. Inspection highly recommended to truly appreciate just how special this home is.
Insights: 4 Apsley Vista, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
Simply Stunning Family Entertainer
This modern residence prides itself on exceptional indoor-outdoor entertaining, complemented by a practical, free flowing floor plan ideal for everyday family living.
Set in a peaceful pocket of Brimbank Gardens, within a short distance to all amenities including a selection of shops, local schools, parks, recreational facilities and transport.
Providing 3 generous bedrooms with BIRs, master with full ensuite, glamorous open plan lounge, dining and kitchen incorporating stylish stainless steel appliances and island breakfast bench, glistening family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry with extensive storage.
Further enhanced by wide decked pergola ideal for year round entertaining, gas ducted heating, ducted cooling system plus double garage with internal access.
Maddison Cantwell : 0412 780 440

Designed For A Lifetime Of Enjoyment

With a sought after location and amenities nearby, this house has all the ingredients to make you feel at home.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP!!!
Those that have an eye for detail will truly appreciate this fantastic 5 bedroom Porter Davis home. Perfectly presented and maintained this home offers every formal and informal space you could ever wish for with luxury features at every turn. Superb kitchen highlighted by the butlers pantry with additional cooking facilities overlooks the dining, main living and rumpus room and by opening the bi-fold doors a huge indoor/outdoor zone is easily created. A separate lounge, massive master retreat at the rear of the property with exquisite ensuite and WIR and a main bathroom and kids retreat area service the additional 4 bedrooms which complete the home. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, additional split system in master, high ceilings, high doors, downlights, quality window furnishings, intercom, stone benches and oversize showers in both bathrooms, low maintenance front and rear gardens,double remote garage with internal access plus double exposed aggregate driveway providing multiple off street parking spaces and much more. A luxurious lifestyle in a quality product awaits.
Insights: 24 Upton Circle, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
Exclusive Living!
This luxury state of the art house designed by Italian builders is living at its best. The home has a generous floorplan, providing an exceptional, family friendly opportunity complemented by one of Derrimut's most central and convenient settings. Close to Derrimut Shopping Centre, public transport, park and schools, immaculate four bedrooms with BIRs, master with full ensuite and WIRs, separate comfortable lounge room, huge open family area adjoining kitchen/meals, large rumpus room and low maintenance garden.
Features: Ducted heating, roller shutters, large garage and much more.
A must see for the growing family!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Assumed to be a thing of the past, this huge vacant allotment offers the very rare opportunity to secure a block of this size at an affordable price so close to the CBD. With no easements and dimensions that will accommodate the largest of homes and still leave plenty of room to design that backyard oasis with room for a pool, large shed, huge outdoor entertaining space and somewhere secure where the kids can play. Situated in a quiet court location yet walking distance to all amenities, those looking to create the perfect sanctuary to enjoy with family are advised to move quickly. Alternatively developers may want to explore subdivision possibilities (STCA).

Description:
Flawless Living, Fantastic Location
Offering a modern lifestyle and an abundant flow of natural light, this home is ideal for those looking for a warm, open and inviting residence. Situated in this sought after location and immaculately presented, this home is conveniently located close to schools, shops, public transport, childcare facilities and parklands.
Boasting a good size formal lounge, 4 fitted bedrooms (master with ensuite and WIR), 2 sparkling bathrooms, and well appointed kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops and ample storage options. Bright and spacious meals and family areas offer a versatile space to enjoy when entertaining during the colder months while the alfresco area makes entertaining a breeze during the warmer months. Additional appointments include landscaped gardens and a double garage with direct access to the home. With the perfect blend of style, comfort and location, this is a must see home. Call for a personalised inspection
Terms: 10% deposit and Balance in 30 days

Description:
Entertainer's Delight
This absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing
impeccable workmanship alongside modern family luxury living. This 46 square (Approx)
home boasts a superb floor plan comprising of 5 lavish bedrooms, 3 stunning bathrooms as well a generous ensemble of living rooms.
The interior is instantly eye-catching with its wide entrance flowing throughout the ground level. A decadent master suite complete with walk-in robes, large en suite which enables you to immerse yourself in absolute seclusion and serenity.
The gourmet kitchen highlights the home's luxury and detail with plenty of bench space and
ample cupboard storage. The very best stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooker, glass splashback and a walk-in butler's pantry.
For leisure, the astounding property offers an exciting variety of indoor and outdoor options. It comprises of a massive enclosed entertaining
area.
To further ensure a lifestyle of effortless peace and comfort, convenience and pleasure, upstairs there is a great-sized rumpus room which is ideal for a children's retreat. Other features include, 16 solar panels, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, internal access from the double garage and much, much more....
The home is ideally located in the heart of Derrimut and within close proximity to the schools, transport, freeway and a choice of shopping precincts. Nothing could be finer.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

This Porter Davis home offers 4 large bedrooms with built in robes, (Master with walk in robes) central bathroom will cater for little ones while the master suite provides room for your own parents retreat and large en-suite with double vanities. The home features many upgrades and offers unsurpassed quality in fixtures & fittings. Additional features of this home are double garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double glazed windows, high ceilings, alarm system, quality window furnishings, caesar stone bench tops. Description:
A Pristine & Spacious Family Home
Absolutely enticing to all, this Metricon built family home is completed from front to back leaving nothing to do but to move in and enjoy! Further features include; caesar stone kitchen, ducted heating, split system cooling, sensor alarm, down-lights throughout, double garage with internal access and hand built cubby house. Located in one of Derrimut's most coveted locations, this outstanding residence is only 20 minutes to the CBD and has every modern day requirement at your disposal.

Description:
Passion Meets Perfection
A breathtaking residence located in the beautiful Derrimut Estate that rests on a substantial 507m2 (approximately) block. Sure to leave a long lasting impression, this brilliantly built, perfectly positioned family home has everything you're looking for. As you walk through the welcoming entrance hall, you will be greeted by the luxuriant master bedroom
with walk in robes and a stunning ensuite with an oversized shower and spa. Leading through is the kitchen which overlooks the oversized alfresco making it the ideal setting for entertaining guests. Endless living areas including a spacious open plan meals/living area and a separate formal lounge providing a vast array of living options. The kitchen features quality appliances, glass splash back, dishwasher and a walk in pantry. The home also accommodates a central bathroom, and two more generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes. Additional features include refrigerated cooling, heating, floating floors, security alarm system, intercom, two split systems, high ceilings, and a double remote control garage with internal and external access. This home is sure to tick all your boxes so be sure to inspect soon.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Prime Position, Low Maintenance Opportunity!
A rare opportunity to secure this large 4 bedroom family home within close proximity to all amenities. Only a short 30 min (approx.) drive to the CBD, walking distance to parks, schools and shops, makes this a must when making the next big family move. Comprising four generously sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite and three remaining bedrooms also offering built in robes. Bright central bathroom with easy access from the living room and remaining bedrooms, large tiled meals area and a spacious lounge, perfect for any host to entertain. Heading outdoors, you're presented with a fully concreted outside entertaining area, with a spacious rear yard, boasting 446m2 (approx.) of land in total. Stone kitchen bench tops, stainless steel appliances, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, intercom and remote double lock up garage with internal access to the home. An opportunity like this doesn't show up often. Don't delay and enquire today!
Scott Perry : 0439 595 461
